Text:
function RYU_EP04_09()
    -- .起-7【11月第3週】「姫騎士の裏切り」
    SaveData.Title = "姫騎士の裏切り"

    -- //CG：姫騎士の裏切り
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV021aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav")

    MSG([[ Beyond the arcade of the shopping street. Daria Himegami is standing in a space bathed in the setting sun. ]])

    MSG([[ However, the expression she wore was completely different from before. A malicious, icy smile. ]])

    MSG([[ Uran Ryuguuin quietly stepped closer to me and grasped my sleeve. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1796.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "What exactly do you want, Daria?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0491.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "If I said I just stopped by this town by chance and happened to meet you all, would you accept that?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1797.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...No. There’s something I’ve felt I needed to ask you for a long time." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1798.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "From what I heard from Hermes, I couldn’t help but guess your true identity." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0611.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "D-Daria’s... true identity? What do you mean, Erika?" ]])

    MSG([[ I hesitated slightly about saying it in front of Uran, but I couldn’t hold back my feelings. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter what, I couldn’t help but confront Daria with my thoughts. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1799.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hermes said that everything that has supported her actions until now was you, Daria." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1800.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "In other words, it was you who urged Hermes to defeat Marika in this March’s Princess Election." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0492.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Oh my. What’s so strange about supporting my little sister?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1801.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes, it would be fine if you were just a caring older sister. But if there’s another purpose... the possibilities narrow down." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0612.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "W-What purpose? Even if it means making your own sister the Princess, what is it that you want to achieve—" ]])

    MSG([[ At that point, Uran covered her mouth. ]])

    MSG([[ She seemed to realize something too. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0613.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Could it be... to crush Marika-sama, the head of the conservative faction?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1802.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes. Exactly that. Without Marika, the conservative faction will lose its cohesion. Naturally, the atmosphere within the school will shift towards coeducation." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0614.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "So, Daria’s true identity is—" ]])

    MSG([[ The more I calmly thought about what Hermes told me, the more the possibilities narrowed. ]])

    MSG([[ Sadly, if that possibility is the truth... ]])

    MSG([[ That I deepened exchanges with the boys’ division. That she listened to my troubles. That she sided with me during the Princess Election against Uran. ]])

    MSG([[ All of those actions would suddenly have meaning. ]])

    MSG([[ I summoned up my courage, suppressing my kind yet timid self, and stated the core truth. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1803.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Daria... You are the shadowy pro-coeducation faction who has been secretly obstructing the conservatives, aren’t you?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1804.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "At times, closely watching the boys’ division’s movements. Other times, bridging the gap between boys and girls. And during the election with Uran, supporting me..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1805.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I didn’t want to believe you were the enemy. I thought through various possibilities... but the more I think about it, the more it all fits." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1806.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If you are the leader of the pro-coeducation faction, everything makes perfect sense." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0493.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "...Exactly. To arrive at the truth from just those hints, you truly are Marika’s cousin, aren’t you?" ]])

    MSG([[ Daria sneered. Mocking me as if laughing at me finally realizing the truth. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0494.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Is the reason you realized it really just Hermes’ words? But I must say, your intuition is a bit too sharp." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1807.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Someone saw you confessing to Marika on the school festival day." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0495.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I see, that was a complete blunder. I took it for granted that no one else would see because it was the school festival." ]])

    MSG([[ Daria dropped her shoulders in an exaggerated manner. She didn’t argue against my words at all, which made me incredibly furious. ]])

    MSG([[ Some part of me had still hoped that Daria would easily deny my theory. ]])

    -- //CI：エリカBU（悲しみ）切り抜き 090
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000ab")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_ERI01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,-50)
    SET_CUTIN_01_M(100, 500)

    MSG([[ But truly. Without a doubt. Daria was my enemy. ]])

    RESET_CUTIN_01(100, 500)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1808.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Why..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1809.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Why were you kind to me!? Why did you act like an ally!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1810.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Minato, everyone else, and surely even Marika all trusted you! How could you betray us!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Unable to hold back my emotions, I voiced my anger plainly. Yet, even accepting my rage, Daria remained unfazed. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0496.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "As you guessed, Erika." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0497.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "My goal from the start was to gain your trust and promote coeducation. Since my goal was achieved, I left you all. That’s all there is to it." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0498.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "If I opposed Uran recklessly, I would have been cast as the villain, but your cousin handled things skillfully. I truly appreciate that." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0615.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "A-Are you serious?" ]])

    -- //CG：姫騎士の裏切り（背景のみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV021ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（真剣）、ダリア（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Interrupting as if unable to contain herself, Uran pressed Daria with fierce intensity. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0616.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】serious
 "We genuinely trusted you. We cherished you as a comrade. How can you be so indifferent after trampling on those feelings?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0617.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】serious
 "I don’t mind if you hurt me. I won’t blame you for betrayal. But if you mean to harm Yuriai Private Academy, I will fight you decisively!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0618.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】serious
 "Please don’t stain this academy we all love!" ]])

    MSG([[ Facing Daria to protect Yuriai Private Academy, Uran’s feelings were palpable. ]])

    MSG([[ She truly loves Yuriai Private Academy. Her passion is deeply conveyed. ]])

    MSG([[ But Daria didn’t seem to be affected, responding with a frivolous smile. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0499.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "Don’t be so rushed. I came today with a proposal that’s good for both Minato and Erika." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1811.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised, casual
 "A proposal?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Making a calming gesture toward Uran and me, Daria continued speaking. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0500.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "To conclude, I want to hold a Princess Election against you, Erika. If I defeat you and bring you under my control, it will be a big step towards coeducation." ]])

    MSG([[ I am fundamentally pro-coeducation. I want to advance coeducation slowly without breaking tradition. ]])

    MSG([[ But since I defeated Uran in the Princess Election, I have even gained support from conservative students. ]])

    MSG([[ If I were to lose the election now, it would cause major confusion among the conservatives. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0501.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "However, you won’t agree. Right now, you’re filled with hatred for me." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1812.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious, casual
 "Yes, I can say that for sure. I have no intention of joining your despicable plan." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1813.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious, casual
 "I’m not conservative, but I want to protect Yuriai Private Academy’s traditions. I won’t fall for your forced push for coeducation." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0502.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "But what if it’s for Marika?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1814.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised, casual
 "Huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Daria chuckled in a low voice. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0503.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】serious
 "Erika, your obsession with the ‘Princess’ is to awaken Marika, isn’t it?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1815.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】flustered, casual
 "H-How do you know that!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0619.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】flustered
 "...!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0504.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "That expression seems to tell me that Uran also knows the circumstances." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0505.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "As you know, Marika Ikusa has remained in a coma following her defeat in the last Princess Election. Medically, it shouldn’t be strange if she awakened soon, but for some reason, she hasn’t." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0506.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "Why hasn’t she awakened? I have one theory." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0507.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】sad
 "She must have suffered a massive shock after her pride was trampled and she was betrayed by her closest friend—me." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0508.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "If there is a way to wake Marika, couldn’t it be through my apology?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1816.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】flustered, casual
 "Th-That’s..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I couldn’t deny the possibility. If what Daria said is true, then she certainly placed a heavy burden on Marika’s heart. ]])

    MSG([[ There would be nothing strange if the key to waking Marika was an apology from Daria. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0509.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】normal
 "Seems you’ve got the situation. If Erika wins against me in the Princess Election, I will kneel and apologize to Marika for everything." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0510.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "However, if I win, you must become an official member of the pro-coeducation faction—this will be a serious match staking your and my convictions." ]])

    MSG([[ Daria spoke in the familiar calm tone I know well. ]])

    MSG([[ The familiarity of her tone made me all the more frustrated. I still wished somehow that the Daria before me was someone else. ]])

    MSG([[ But both her demeanor and tone were exactly the Daria I knew, forcing me to accept that this was indeed Daria Himegami, who had spent time with me. ]])

    MSG([[ It was unbearably sad. ]])

    -- //CI：エリカBU（真剣）口元切り抜き 091
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000ab")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_ERI03da")
    LAYER_POSITION(201, 0, 105)
    SET_CUTIN_06_M(100, 500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1817.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious, casual
 "……………" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    RESET_CUTIN_00()
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",100,false)
    -- //CI：エリカBU（真剣）斜め切り抜き 092
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000ab")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_ERI03ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(201, -70, 0)
    SET_CUTIN_31_XL(-35, 500)

    MSG([[ —There was no choice but to fight. ]])

    MSG([[ I clenched my trembling hand into a fist. And looked straight at my enemy, declaring. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1818.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious, casual
 "Understood. I will accept your challenge to the Princess Election—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    RESET_CUTIN_31_XL(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0620.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】normal
 "Please wait, Erika." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran stopped me just as I was about to respond to Daria. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0621.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】normal
 "Daria, aren’t you targeting the wrong opponent? You have someone you should face before Erika." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0511.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】normal
 "Oh? And who would that be?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0622.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】normal
 "I am Uran Ryuguuin—the representative of the conservative faction." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0512.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】surprised
 "...Well, I’m surprised. It’s rare for you, a pacifist, to propose a fight yourself." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0623.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】normal
 "I am carrying on the will of Marika-sama, the previous leader. If the only way to save Marika-sama is to settle things with you, then I will fight." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0624.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】serious
 "We will settle our grudge once and for all." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0513.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "Very well. I also desire to settle this with you." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0514.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】serious
 "I’ll take care of all the necessary arrangements. Prepare yourself for the real match." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
STOP_BGM(2000)


    -- //BU：ウラン（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ After saying only that, Daria left us. ]])

    MSG([[ As dusk completely enveloped the surroundings, Uran stood silently. ]])

    MSG([[ My heart still pounding wildly, I nervously asked her. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1819.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】flustered
 "U-Uran, are you sure it’s okay? To accept a Princess Election with Daria like that?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0625.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】normal
 "Of course. Daria clearly targeted Erika. It’s reasonable to think some kind of trap is set." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0626.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】normal
 "By taking it on myself instead of Erika, I’m sure her plan has been disrupted. I believe it’s best that I accept." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1820.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "B-But that means the trap might be aimed at you! Something irreparable could happen like with Marika..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0627.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】smile
 "If the roles were reversed, would you just watch silently, Erika?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1821.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】flustered
 "Ugh." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I’m not confident I could stay silent. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if danger came to me, I probably would have declared myself to take the election. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0628.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】wry smile
 "That silence is the answer. When you took on the election to protect Ouga Rokujou, I thought, “What a foolish act.” But now I understand." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0629.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】normal
 "I am not mature enough to quietly watch a precious friend get hurt. Especially if that friend is you, Erika." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0630.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】smile
 "And if we win, that’s all that matters. Erika and I will cooperate to save Marika-sama." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1822.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile
 "...That’s true." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran was right. No matter how strong an opponent Daria is, no matter what traps she sets, if we win, everything will be settled peacefully. ]])

    MSG([[ By now, the Princess Election cannot be stopped. We must somehow have Uran defeat Daria and awaken Marika. ]])

    MSG([[ There’s no other choice left. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1823.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "Still... Daria really was our enemy, huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0631.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】normal
 "...Yes. Whatever her reasons, we cannot let this go." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0632.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】normal
 "When we win the Princess Election, not only will she apologize to Marika, but she will have to tell us everything honestly." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0633.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】sad
 "Surely Daria has her own reasons behind this." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1824.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sad
 "...Yes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Hoping to stand together against Daria in the Princess Election, I grasped Uran’s hand. ]])

    MSG([[ Her hand trembled slightly, perhaps from anxiety. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP04_10")
end
